Procedure for varying charges at off-street parking places
	Section 35C of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 (variation of chargesat off-street parking places) is amended as follows.
	In subsection (4), after paragraph (a) insert—
		consultation about their proposal;”.
	After subsection (4) insert—
		“(4A)Regulations under this section may make different provision for differentpurposes.”.
Procedure for varying charges at designated parking places
	Section 46A of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 (variation of chargesat designated parking places) is amended as follows.
	In subsection (4), after paragraph (a) insert—
		consultation about their proposal;”.
	After subsection (4) insert—
		“(4A)Regulations under this section may make different provision for differentpurposes.”
Commencement, extent, application and short title
	This Act comes into force at the end of the period of 2 months beginningwith the day on which this Act is passed.
	This Act extends to England and Wales.
	But the amendments made by sections 1 and 2 apply only in relation toregulations made by the Secretary of State.
	This Act may be cited as the Parking Places (Variation of Charges) Act2017.
